story_prompts.prompt: A time traveler accidentally prevents their own birth
story_prompts.sample_opening: The moment I shook my grandmother's hand at the 1962 World's Fair, I felt myself beginning to fade...

story_prompts.prompt: The last bookstore in a digital world
story_prompts.sample_opening: Marcus turned the sign to 'Open' knowing he might be the last person to ever do so...

product_ideas.solution: Smart pot with sensors and auto-watering
AR app showing available spots in real-time
